notes.text: Core: DragInfo/DropInfo are added to configure drag-and-drop
sap.m.IconTabBar: Drag&Drop is enabled in overflow
QUnit Designtime Library tests in Firefox
sap.m.Dialog: correct padding of the subheader when Toolbar is used
sap.m.FacetFilter: focus correctly set on a FacetFilterList in SingleSelectMaster mode
sap.m.ObjectHeader: prevent tap Event when tap is not on a active element
sap.m.ObjectNumber: Invisible text for the ValueState updated correctly on setState
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Now the width is consistent in all browsers
sap.m.SegmentedButton: native browser focus outline removed
sap.m.TabContainer: Scrolling issue in RTL on Safari corrected
sap.m.BusyDialog: StyleClass methods are now forwarded to the inner Dialog
sap.m.DatePicker- change of displayFormat updates the placeholder
sap.m.MessageBox: improve documentation
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Reset cached sizes on control reset
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Custom appointments sorter
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: appointments have correct legend colors now
sap.m.TimePicker: Value is set correctly on change.
sap.m.Wizard: Next button improved accessibility
sap.ui.unified.Calendar: nonWorkingDays now can have another type when set using specialDates aggregation
sap.m.Button: Now the icons are with the correct color when Reject/Accept/Emphasized + Disabled
sap.m.GrowingEnablement: Focus shouldn't jump out of the control.
sap.m.Input: SelectedItem is now correctly set when tap is pressed
sap.m.Panel: Control html is now valid
sap.m.Popover: Remove unneeded scroll
sap.m.QuickView: Auto closing is now fixed
sap.m.StepInput: pressing PageUp or PageDown doesn't scroll the page now
sap.ui.unified.MenuListItem: Arrow positioned correctly in compact mode
